Text: The Cremaster films are not available on video -- at least not unless you?re a wealthy art collector. Each film has been released in an edition of ten -- the discs are housed in lavish sculptural packaging and individually signed and numbered by Barney (see image below). Single discs have sold at auction for over $385,000.!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!!
This is absolutely amazing! How did you get your hands on these?

This is unquestionably the best version of The Cremaster Cycle you will find online. Absolutely incredible.

Thank you Beksinski.
